name: ${name}
title: Kafka Connect XTDB
description:
Sink connector that allows you to ingest data from Kafka into XTDB.

A transform is provided for specifying XTDB data types for the columns of ingested records, based on the Kafka record schema.

support.summary: XTDB is distributed as warranty free open source software. Official support for use of XTDB with Kafka Connect is available from Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc.
